name: soulsync
description: SoulSync is an automated music discovery and collection manager that syncs playlists from Spotify, Tidal, or YouTube to your local library and media servers via Soulseek and slskd.
features: Playlist syncing: Automatically downloads music from Spotify, Tidal, or YouTube playlists.
Soulseek integration: Searches and downloads tracks via Soulseek P2P network.
Quality preferences: Prioritizes FLAC or high-bitrate MP3 downloads.
Metadata tagging: Adds proper ID3 tags to downloaded music files.
Library organization: Organizes files by artist, album, and track structure.
Duplicate detection: Avoids downloading songs already in your library.
Automated monitoring: Checks playlists regularly for new additions.
Media server sync: Updates Plex, Jellyfin, or other servers after downloads.
Search fallbacks: Tries multiple search strategies to find rare tracks.
Download queue: Manages multiple simultaneous downloads efficiently.
Notification system: Alerts when new music is downloaded.
Web interface: Monitors and controls sync operations through browser.
